original_title: The Art of Sweeping Under the Rug
overview: The Art Of Sweeping Under The Rug presents a trilogy of vignettes focusing on societal apathy, male inaction, and general indifference towards the commodification of, over-sexualization of, and violence against women.
tagline: An aspiring performer, a shut-in techie, a vapid couple, drunk punks, reality tv, spying on your neighbors, mysterious vhs tapes, Mini Frozen Quiches... and all the while, in the background world, something even more sinister is being allowed to happen.
title: The Art of Sweeping Under the Rug
